repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:14.04 
MAINTAINER nick@7mbtech.com 

# update apt and install beanstalkd 
RUN apt-get update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get --no-install-recommends install -q -y \
beanstalkd && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

VOLUME ["/data"] 
EXPOSE 11300 
CMD ["/usr/bin/beanstalkd", "-f", "60000", "-b", "/data"]
